thread.title: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
thread.title_full: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs

title: CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs
text: > Top News CC Sabathia to enter alcohol rehab center, miss playoffs FILE - In this Sept. 25, 2015, file photo, New York Yankees pitcher CC Sabathia reacts during the seventh inning of a baseball game against the Chicago White Sox at Yankee Stadium in New York. Sabathia is checking into an alcohol rehabilitation center and will miss the postseason. The team released a statement from the pitcher Monday, Oct. 5, 2015, a day before New York plays Houston in the AL wild-card game. (AP Photo/Bill Kostroun, File)
